BadgeDetail.Name: Sports Performer
BadgeDetail.Description: The earner of this badge has demonstrated effective execution of the skills and techniques required by various sports in a competitive environment.

Task.Title: The Variety Performance
Task.Body: Upload five different videos of you performing a variety of different skills in a competitive environment for five different sports.
Task.HtmlBody: Upload five different videos of you performing a variety of different skills in a competitive environment for five different sports.
Task.TextileBody: Upload five different videos of you performing a variety of different skills in a competitive environment for five different sports.
